TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1654
TEI.2.document_title: William Scott to Stephen F. Austin, 06-02-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: William Scott to Austin, June 2, 1827. Receipt for grinding corn and hire of boat.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1654

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William Scott to Austin, June 2, 1827. Receipt for grinding corn and hire of boat.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* */p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Wm Scott Dr*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*To grinding 8 bushels and 3 pecks Com __________________ $6.56 1/4 */p* *p*To the Hire of sail Boat to go to *location_mentioned*Galveston*/location_mentioned*_________________________23.43 3/4*/p*
*p*3O. 00*/p* *p*Recd Payment by Credit on my note.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm Scott*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-02-1827">June 2d 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
